title: AI-Based Program to Improve Understanding of the Greenhouse Effect Concept

context.prior_knowledge: Basic climate science knowledge and social science analytical skills
context.additional_context: Environment enabling data analysis and collaborative learning using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify conceptual errors related to the greenhouse effect with 80% accuracy using NLP technology.
Learners can explain climate change mechanisms through case analysis applying MLP algorithms.
Learners can create a visualization report of conceptual misunderstanding patterns using a hybrid model (ensemble) approach.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
